docs.title: Twitch Bot ✨
docs.text: ❓ A simple Twitch channel bot created on my live streamings for helping and interacting with my viewers/chat.

docs.title: 📋 Requirements
docs.text: You can check the requirements for this project on the requirements page.

docs.title: 🔎 Usage
docs.text:
1. Clone the repo to your machine.
  2. Update or install dependencies:

poetry install

  1. Setup your .env with your Twitch channel data, you can use the .env.example as a template.
  2. Change your commands messages or create new ones
  3. Start the project:

poetry run bot 🎉 | Successfully connected to the channel @amandamartinsdev on Twitch.

docs.title: 📋 Issues
docs.text: Feel free to open an issue if you find a bug or have a suggestion, so we can discuss the best way to improve or fix it.

docs.title: 👋 Contributing
docs.text: You're always welcome to contribute to this project, just create your pull request, and wait for the review.
